modName: Skyrim Theme Music with Malukah Dragonborn comes intro
summary: It\'s a modification of the original main theme music Sons of Skyrim. It simply adds a few verses of the DragonBorn Comes version of Malukah. (NOT MADE BY ME. IT\'S JUST A MASHUP).
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1984]this mod[/url], I decided to add a bit of Malukah\'s interpretation of Dragonborn comes to the Main Theme music of Skyrim.

I used messiahgov\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1509]HQ XWM Main Theme Music - For Real[/url] for the main theme, and the .fuz files included on NodusCursorius\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2801]Bard music replacement by Malukah[/url] for the intro.

I also included an mp3 file of the song.

NOT MADE BY ME. I JUST MADE THE MASHUP.
author: Bombermans
